revision.text:
'''Sinnoh''' is the fourth [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 107 Pokémon from Turtwig #387 to Arceus #493. [[File:Sinnoh_V0.9.11.png|thumb|A Town Map of the Sinnoh region]] ===[[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Towns, Cities]], and [[Shops#Sinnoh: Locations & Items|Shops]]=== {| class="wikitable" |- | [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Twinleaf Town]] || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Oreburgh City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Eterna City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Hearthome City]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Solaceon Town]] || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Celesitic Town]] || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Pastoria City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Veilstone City]] |- | [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Sunyshore City]] || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Survival Area]] || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Resort Area]] || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Pokémon League Sinnoh]] |} ===Routes=== ''See [[Route Statistics]] for more in-depth info.'' {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! [[Hall of Origin]] |- | ''Wild Pokémon'': [[File:Slowpoke.png|30px]]Slowpoke, [[File:Spearow.png|30px]]Spearow, [[File:Garchomp.png|30px]]Garchomp, [[File:Slakoth.png|30px]]Slakoth, [[File:Eevee.png|30px]]Eevee, [[File:Breloom.png|30px]]Breloom, [[File:Absol.png|30px]]Absol, '''[[File:Slaking.png|30px]]Slaking, [[File:Snorlax.png|30px]]Snorlax, [[File:Shuckle.png|30px]]Shuckle, [[File:Blissey.png|30px]]Blissey, [[File:Arceus.png|30px]]Arceus (normal)''' |- |} ===Walkthrough=== [[File:Sinnoh_Flow_Chart_Updated.png|500px]] *Route 204 is located North of Jubilife City *Route 212 is located West of Pastoria City *Celestic Town is located North of Route 210 *Route 218 is located West of Jubilife City *Iron Island is located in the sea North of Canalave City *Route 219 is located South of Sandgem Town *Distortion World is located on Route 214 *Lake Valor is located on Route 214 *Lake Verity is located West of Route 201 *Lake Acuity is located on Route 217 *Newmoon Island is located in the sea North of Canalave City *Fullmoon Island is located in the sea North of Canalave City *Snowpoint Temple is located in Snowpoint City *Spear Pillar is located in between Mt. Coronet North and South *Fight Area is located North of Veilstone City (Leftmost town on separate landmass) *Route 225 is located North of Fight Area ===Exclusive Pokémon=== ====[[Fossils]] ==== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Fossil !!
